title: Female Faces
body:
I wish they would stop using the very similar faces for every "sexy" female character. There are so many beautiful faces they could do that would make their characters stand out from each other.

 I don't think making sexy characters is bad but why would you make them all look the same when there are so many ways you could explore sexiness or beauty. Is it because the artists can't draw female faces any other way or is the upper management breathing down their necks?

These faces are all white and pretty but still different.

https://i.imgur.com/1bR9pWf.jpg[\img]

https://i.imgur.com/r3pGJsf.jpg[\img]

To be fair, the OP is not speaking against pretty women. They just think that Riot puts one face type on the pedestal and discards other face types as "not pretty", which is not correct. 

1) League of Legends has not any power to define, make or explore  beauty statements and influence the opinions.  It is here to create bright designs for a MOBA game. Hundreds, thousands of people play games and build IRL relationships just fine because they can separate the two. Those, who cannot do that, need a therapist.

2) Style is a thing. Talon, Lee Sin, Yasuo, TF don't look like themselves on all their skins because these skins were drawn by different artists. That means that the features you see on splash arts are not set in stone and they can be tweaked (safe for skin color, eye and hair color, general structure, etc) according to the setting.

The OP has shown Ashe and Leblanc, and honestly, these are the oldest champs that haven't been reworked. So, when they needed a new splash art, the artist didn't have anything to work with as for the facial features or take freedom with their clothing (people are known for throwing a tantrum "Make character A look like their splash art or fuck you Rito!!!"), so they focused on their abilities (Leblanc casting illusion and sneaking away on her art, Ashe shooting her bow with Freljord on the background) which was a smart decision. 

Also the OP has selected faces drawn from the same angle which already makes them look similar and does not give a clear view of their features, which is not really trustworthy. However, even despite these angles, I can say that Leblanc and Ahri have different eyeshape and cheekbone structure. 

I also don't know why the OP decided to use Xayah fanart, when she canonically has a round face and plump cheeks:
